c.DAO

Interface CustomerDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerDBDAO

    public interface CustomerDAO
    Interface that allows the application to perform all essential methods that involve communication with the database table Customer. The communication channel for this interface is the JavaBean Customer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCustomer(Customer customer)
      Add Customer to database.
      java.util.Collection<Customer> getAllCustomer()
      Get all customers from database.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCoupons(Customer customer)
      Get all coupons bought by the given customer.
      Customer getCustomer(java.lang.Long id)
      Get the customer with the given ID from database.
      Customer getCustomer(java.lang.String name)
      overloading for usage in the Facade Get the customer with the given NAME from database.
      boolean login(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
      Verifies a customer user credentials.
      void removeCustomer(Customer customer)
      Remove customer from the customer table of the database, if customer with the given ID Exists.
      void updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      Change information of specific Customer.

    • Method Detail

      • createCustomer

        void createCustomer(Customer customer)
             throws DAOException
        Add Customer to database.
        Parameters:
        customer - Customer object to add to database
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection with the database failed.

      • removeCustomer

        void removeCustomer(Customer customer)
             throws DAOException
        Remove customer from the customer table of the database, if customer with the given ID Exists.
        Parameters:
        customer - The customer to remove.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection with the database failed.

      • updateCustomer

        void updateCustomer(Customer customer)
             throws DAOException
        Change information of specific Customer. The coupons are not changed/added/removed by this method.
        Parameters:
        customer - The customer.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection with the database failed.

      • getCustomer

        Customer getCustomer(java.lang.Long id)
              throws DAOException
        Get the customer with the given ID from database.
        Parameters:
        id - The requested customer's ID.
        Returns:
        The customer from database with the given ID.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When customer with the given ID haven't been found, or connection with the database failed.

      • getCustomer

        Customer getCustomer(java.lang.String name)
              throws DAOException
        overloading for usage in the Facade Get the customer with the given NAME from database.
        Parameters:
        name - The requested customer's NAME.
        Returns:
        The customer from database with the given NAME.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When customer with the given NAME haven't been found, or connection with the database failed.

      • getAllCustomer

        java.util.Collection<Customer> getAllCustomer()
                                       throws DAOException
        Get all customers from database.
        Returns:
        All customers from database.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection with the database failed.

      • getCoupons

        java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCoupons(Customer customer)
                                 throws DAOException
        Get all coupons bought by the given customer.
        Parameters:
        customer - The customer for which to search coupons for.
        Returns:
        All coupons bought by the given customer.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection with the database failed.

      • login

        boolean login(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String password)
       throws DAOException
        Verifies a customer user credentials.
        Parameters:
        name - The customer name.
        password - The customer password.
        Returns:
        True - if verification resulted true.
        False - if verification resulted false.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection with the database failed.
